transcript:
Customer: Kya issue hai? Kya issue aa raha hai ye batao?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Good morning sir. Good morning sir Vishal bol raha hu sir IndiaMART se sir. Services team se baat kar raha hu sir. Aapne kal call kiya tha to call utha nahi tha. Yes sir. Kal aapne call kiya tha na mujhe?
Customer: Nahi to.
Executive: Ah, maine aapko call kiya hoga services ke liye, fir aapne call back kiya hoga mujhe. To usme na sir ticket raise ho jati hai agar hum call nahi utha pa rahe hai to hamari taraf se ticket raise ho jati hai ek. Yes sir? Ha boliye. To mai aapko bata raha tha sir, aap byleads vgera consume kar rahe hai sir daily basis pe? Byleads vgera aap consume nahi kar rahe hai. Isi regarding maine aapko call kiya tha. Kya dikkat aa rahi hai? Matlab kya issue face kar rahe hai sir aap? Bataiye jra hame.
Customer: Yes sir? Usme hamara interest nahi hai isliye hum nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Ah, matlab you services use karne me interest nahi hai ya byleads vgera aapko relevant nahi mil rahi hai? Ye bataiye aap. Aapne services li hai to use karne ke liye hi li hongi na sir services. To usme kya dikkat face kar rahe hai aap bataiye sir hame tabhi to hum aapko bata payenge sari chije, help kar payenge kuch sir.
Customer: Yes sir?
Executive: Just do teen minute lunga jyada nahi lunga aapki. Aap bataiye sir. Aapki help ke liye baithe hai sir idhar hum.
Customer: Nahi nahi help ke liye nahi ho aap abhi wo wo wala kaam nahi karna chahta hai dusra kaam kar raha hai abhi.
Executive: Achha matlab jo jo aapne yaha product vgera dal rakhe hai jaise aap jo product me deal nahi kar rahe hai aap un products me?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ek minute mai ek minute aapka check kar leta hu.
Executive: By, ah, aap apna seller panel open kar sakte hai ek bar?
Customer: Mai abhi thoda road me hu sir.
Executive: Road par hai abhi aap?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Just ek minute dijiyega mai open kar leta hu usme fir.
Executive: Sir do minute lunga aapki. To jo earings vgera me inme aap deal nahi kar rahe hai ab?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi band hai. Inme jaise ka stone earing, stone earing hai sari ye stone ye sab band hai wo band ho chuka hai aapka kaam ab?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ab matlab chal nahi raha hai isme?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: To aap kisme deal karna chah rahe hai sir ab aap? Matlab ab business kisme apna open kiya aapne?
Customer: Nahi abhi dusra jagah me kaam kar raha hu abhi.
Executive: Aap dusri jagah kaam kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Achha ek bat chij bataiye mujhe. Ki ye Pratham Creation hai. Ye aapki company hai ya kisi aur ki company hai?
Customer: Mera hi hai.
Executive: Ye aapka hi hai na Pratham Creation?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To, ah, to isme aap ab matlab dusri chije use karna matlab dusra business kholna chah rahe hai ya yahi business chalana chahenge aap aage?
Customer: Aage yahi karega baad me.
Executive: Matlab isi business ko continue karenge aap?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To sir abhi aap matlab fir aapni services bhi use karenge ya baad me? Abhi to services use nahi kar rahe hai aap. Aapka jo subscription aapne le rakha tha wo ek saal ke liye le rakha hai. 26 tak le rakha hai. To wo aapka waste jayega sir. Samajh rahe hai na aap? To aapki na visibility, ha aapka page already sir visibility and listing thodi abhi bani hui hai aapki. To usko continue rakhne ke liye na aap daily basis pe na ek do bylead consume kar lijiye daily basis pe. Phone me use karte the apna IndiaMART ka account ya laptop pe?
Customer: Phone me.
Executive: Phone me?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ek minute sir. Hai na to usme na aap daily basis pe bylead vgera consume karenge na to upgrade, ah, jisse aapki visibility aur listing badhti rahegi. Usme fark nahi padega jisse aapko calls aur enquiry direct aane lag jayengi. To vese kab se start karne ki soch rahe hai sir aap ye bataiye?
Customer: Dekhta hu tab.
Executive: Yes sir?
Customer: Bad me.
Executive: Matlab kaha pe, kaha se hai aapki company? West Bengal se hai aap?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: West Bengal me kaha se sir? City konsa hai aapka?
Customer: Dankuni, Dankuni.
Executive: Dankuni?
Executive: Kiske pass hai ye? Kolkata ke pass ya Hawra ke pass kiske pass hai?
Customer: Ha Kolkata ka pass hi hai.
Executive: Kolkata ke pass hai? Kitna dur hai Kolkata se?
Customer: Kolkata se hoga 15 kilometer dur hoga.
Executive: Aur sir na inme kuch products hai to ek product hai aapka. Just ek minute dijiyega mujhe. Ye golden jhumka vgera in sab me aap deal karte hai? Ye khud banate hai aap ya fir manufacturer hai aap ye bataiye? Matlab manufacturer hai ya fir aap khud dusro se lete hai supply karte hai yaha sirf?
Customer: Manufacturer hi hai.
Executive: Manufacturer karte hai aap?
Executive: To thik hai sir jab aap services consume, aap abhi sir bylead consume kar sakte hai abhi do teen?
Customer: Ha bad me karta hu.
Executive: Okay sir okay sir. Iska lijiyega consume. Aur koi dikkat ho to sir aap call kar lijiyega. Thik hai to abhi mai aapki wo ticket ko sir mai close kar de raha hu jo aapne call kiya tha na to wo mai call nahi utha paya tha wo ek issue raise ho gaya tha ticket close open ho gayi thi. Call na uthane ke karan to mai us ticket ko close kar deta hu abhi sir. Yes sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not using IndiaMART services.

- Customer is not dealing with listed products.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about the reason for not using services.

- Executive suggested consuming buyleads to maintain visibility.

- Executive offered to close the previously raised ticket.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, services, business
